channel.title: Need some Help DSPK [pi]
channel.description:
well i added a new npc drop system.
Npcid,Itemid, and Amount dropped and Rarity.
< But now When u kill a npc in Godwars, you do NOT get any killcount :(
Andwhen you complete RFD minigame you dont get to see the Gloves in the shop anymore. :S
Can any1 give me some help/ Pointers.
Be greatly appreciated.
Thanks!
